summary: MY VEHICLE EXHIBITS ALL OF THE ISSUES ASSOCIATED WITH  NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER 17V-226. I HAVE CONTACTED HYUNDAI NUMEROUS TIMES AND MY REQUESTS KEEP GETTING IGNORED.
